item.description:
@Nathan8888 wrote:

if(player.inArea(2798, 3441)); c.getItems().deleteItem(2677, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2677), 1); c.getItems().addItem(405,1); else: player.sendMessage("Why are you digging here?");
